actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Constitution and Limited Government

official_title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States prohibiting the delegation of the legislative powers granted to Congress.
subjects: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

summary.text:
This joint resolution proposes a constitutional amendment prohibiting the delegation of the legislative powers granted to Congress.

Congress may enact legislation and the President may rescind or terminate any rule, regulation, or order to address the treatment of existing delegations before ratification of this article.

titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States prohibiting the delegation of the legislative powers granted to Congress.
